version_description: Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.

We are aware of an issue which has effected the saved game data of some users and progress has been reset. We have introduced a fix for this issue.

If you have experienced an issue with data loss then email us: support@ninjakiwi.com and we'll restore your missing data.

Thanks for all the positive feedback so far. New content is coming soon!

We are aware of an issue which has effected the saved game data of some users and progress has been reset. We have introduced a fix for this issue.

If you have experienced an issue with data loss then email us: support@ninjakiwi.com and we'll restore your missing data.

Thanks for all the positive feedback so far. New content is coming soon!

Good news Supermonkey, this update is packed with awesome new content!

While experimenting with bomb weapons, Dr Monkey accidentally discovered a secret cavern bursting with Bloons. Now Supermonkey can explore the endless mine! Compete in weekly challenges and rise up the ranks on the leaderboards to compete for awesome prizes.

That's not all though, the Powerups have become supercharged and are now even more powerful. Each Powerup can now be ranked up to level 4 for even more popping power.

Happy Holidays to all of our players all over the world! Thanks for being awesome and supporting Ninja Kiwi, we couldn't do it without you!

Bug fixes and performance improvements. Check out the new Change Log in game for full details.
Bug fixes and performance improvements. Check out the new Change Log in game for full details.

Continue the adventure with a brand new chapter, it's time to soar over Helium Heights!

The Bloons have spread even further throughout the Monkey Kingdom and only the Supermonkey Squad can stop them. Prepare to battle the Bloons in the first Helium Heights update featuring 10 brand new levels, powerful new bosses and be warned, the Bloons have a new trick up their sleeves!

Update 1.2 also contains a whole heap of bug fixes and performance enhancements, for full details check out the in game changelog!

* 1.2.1 - Fixed a server issue with log in.

Weapons at the ready Supermonkey! It's time to continue your adventure into Helium Heights! Dig into the brand new chapter Fossil Hunting and battle your way through 8 challenging levels, then take on the blindingly tricky new boss. Let's get popping!

Weapons at the ready Supermonkey! It's time to continue your adventure into Helium Heights! Dig into the brand new chapter Fossil Hunting and battle your way through 8 challenging levels, then take on the blindingly tricky new boss. Let's get popping!

Unearth the next chapter of Helium Heights: Digging Deep! 7 new levels await you in this dangerous, unexplored area. Plus, a familiar face awaits you if you can make it to the boss level. Are you ready to pop?

Unearth the next chapter of Helium Heights: Digging Deep! 7 new levels await you in this dangerous, unexplored area. Plus, a familiar face awaits you if you can make it to the boss level. Are you ready to pop?

It’s time to take out the trash as you continue your quest in Helium Heights. Battle through the junkyard in Getting Scrappy, featuring 7 brand new levels culminating in an encounter with an old Nemesis. Are you ready to trash some Bloons?

It’s time to take out the trash as you continue your quest in Helium Heights. Battle through the junkyard in Getting Scrappy, featuring 7 brand new levels culminating in an encounter with an old Nemesis. Are you ready to trash some Bloons?

Uncover an ancient mystery in a brand new chapter of Helium Heights: Pyramid Popping. 6 new levels await you in the deserts of ancient Egypt but beware, a supernatural power has awakened to stop Supermonkey in his tracks! Can you overcome the trials of Tutankhabloon?

Uncover an ancient mystery in a brand new chapter of Helium Heights: Pyramid Popping. 6 new levels await you in the deserts of ancient Egypt but beware, a supernatural power has awakened to stop Supermonkey in his tracks! Can you overcome the trials of Tutankhabloon?

The Bloons are breaking free in the latest Helium Heights expansion - Prison Break. The military compound has been compromised and it's now up to the Supermonkey Squad to eradicate the threat. 6 brand new levels await and an old foe resurfaces!

The Bloons are breaking free in the latest Helium Heights expansion - Prison Break. The military compound has been compromised and it's now up to the Supermonkey Squad to eradicate the threat. 6 brand new levels await and an old foe resurfaces!

Dr Monkey has been hard at work in the lab adding iPhone X support! He hasn't stopped there though, his new fusion device means blops can now be converted from one colour to the other.

See the in game patch notes for full details.

The time has come! The final chapter of Helium Heights and the fires of Mount Bloon await you. You'll need all of your skills to master 6 new levels and defeat the almighty Boss Bloon. A grand prize awaits the lucky few who emerge victorious...

Dr Monkey has been hard at work in the lab adding iPhone X support! He hasn't stopped there though, his new fusion device means blops can now be converted from one colour to the other.
